> Tucson smiles and puts a hand on Rodimus's shoulder.
>
> "A fav=
or I would not mind doing for you again, Rodimus. You're worth more to me t=
han any precious metal or power source. And, Torca's right, I - could use a=
 rest, but, perhaps I will get that when I undergo the repairs to my optic =
sensors. Stanton, I need to ask you a favor. One that I know is extremely d=
ifficult to accomplish, and one that I'd never ask of you unless it was a d=
ire need. I would like you to attempt the delicate process of bringing my o=
ptic sensors back online. If it doesn't work, I understand. But I saw how i=
mportant it was for me to be able to see in order to get an idea of the sit=
uation at hand and how to remedy it. A blind eye can only go so far. And if=
 at all possible, could the same be done for Perceptor? He too, deserves a =
second chance of seeing things in a whole new light."

<NEW>

Santon nodded=
, a smile on his face, "I had assumed that you would need
that sooner or la=
ter." He walked over to Tuscon holding a sensors a
few inches from the side=
 of his heard, apparently taking reading, "The
scanners should have a prett=
y good work up on you, but once we get
this room ready I believe we can get=
 your optics wokring again."

Bump had walked over to Rodimus and began run=
ning a scanner over him
as well. "Both of you are to get rest before you go=
 galavanting across
this planet again. You have both been through a lot." B=
ump looked at
both of them meaningfuly, it was apparent he was not going to=
 let them
leave the base withou some recharging and true down time.

<OLD>
=

> "Then my tale has to wait"said dryly Perceptor.

<NEW>

Torca had been w=
atching Tuscon and Rodimus with a critical optic as if
weighing out how muc=
h they could handle, but he glanced over at
Perceptor, "No, it does not."

=
He looked back at Tuscon and then Rodimus, "There are so many tales."
he sa=
id. "We all have much to discuss."

"Yes, yes!" Bump said as he glanced up =
from his scanner reading of
Rodimus, "But not in the medical chamber."

Tor=
ca smiled indulgantly at Bump, "Quite right." He looked over at
Tuscon and =
Rodimus, "Shall we take this to another room?"
